pkgmetadata.longdescription: Knockoffs for Hidden Markov Models and Genetic Data // Generate knockoffs for genetic data and hidden Markov models. For more information, see the website below and the accompanying papers: "Gene hunting with hidden Markov model knockoffs", Sesia et al., Biometrika, 2019, (doi:10.1093/biomet/asy033). "Multi- resolution localization of causal variants across the genome", Sesia et al., bioRxiv, 2019, (doi:10.1101/631390).
